      • ping

        public final void ping()
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       GameJoltException,
                       de.ralleytn.simple.json.JSONParseException
        Pings a running session. Should be done every 30 seconds after opening a session.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something went wrong during the data transfer
        de.ralleytn.simple.json.JSONParseException - if the JSON data could not be parsed
        GameJoltException - if the service says something went wrong

        public final void ping(GameJoltSession.Status status)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       GameJoltException,
                       de.ralleytn.simple.json.JSONParseException
        Pings a running session. Should be done every 30 seconds after opening a session.
        Parameters:
        status - the session status
        Throws:

        de.ralleytn.simple.json.JSONParseException - if the JSON data could not be parsed

                     throws java.io.IOException,
